questions.question_text: Which statement is true about an alarm in a Suppressed state?
What are four NSX built-in role-based access control (RBAC) roles? (Choose four.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BCDE
A. None: This is not a valid role in NSX. Users with "None" access wouldn't have permissions.
F. Enterprise Admin: This is not a built-in NSX role. It may exist in other systems but not in NSX's role list.
G. LB Operator: While NSX has features related to load balancing, "LB Operator" is not a default RBAC role.
